```py
SELECT
 s.state,
 s.store_name,
 s.total_sales,
 s.total_sales / t.state_total_sales AS sales_contribution
FROM
 (
 SELECT
  state,
  store_name,
  SUM(sales) AS total_sales
 FROM
  store_sales
 GROUP BY
  state,
  store_name
) s
INNER JOIN (
 SELECT
  state,
  SUM(sales) AS state_total_sales
 FROM
  store_sales
 GROUP BY
  state
) t ON
 s.state = t.state
ORDER BY
 s.state,
 sales_contribution DESC;
```
